name: awl pike
description: This is a dull, cheaply made replica of a medieval weapon consisting of a wood shaft tipped with an iron spike.

name: awl pike
description: This is a medieval weapon consisting of a wood shaft tipped with an iron spike.  The spike seems to be pretty dull, and the whole thing feels poorly made.

name: awl pike
description: This is a medieval weapon consisting of a wood shaft tipped with an iron spike.  Though large and heavy compared to other spears, its accuracy and damage are unparalleled.
